title: Yuvraj Singh and Hazel Keech blessed with a baby boy
summary: Former Indian cricket star Yuvraj Singh and actress Hazel Keech announced the birth of their first child, a baby boy, through social media on January 25, 2022.
content:
Former India all-rounder Yuvraj Singh and his actress wife Hazel Keech welcomed their first child on Tuesday, January 25.

Taking to his social media handles, Yuvraj announced the good news, sharing their joy with fans, family and friends about becoming first-time parents.
